Sabrina Carpenter: Short n' Sweet, Songwriting & "Espresso" | Apple Music
Descripci√≥n:
Following the charting success of "Espresso" and "Please Please Please", pop superstar Sabrina Carpenter sits down with Zane Lowe in the studio to discuss her highly anticipated newest studio album, Short n' Sweet.

Sabrina goes through a few tracks on the album, reflecting on her childhood, friendships, and relationships that sparked starting points for her songwriting process. She references the track "Sharpest Tool", which touches on unsolved circumstances in a friendship or relationship, and "Espresso", sparking her humorous side and unique approach to songwriting. Closing the conversation, Sabrina touches on her genuine love for music and shares how her childhood upbringing allowed her to follow that creative passion.
